entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 12:30 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 except minus 13 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9 except minus 13 inland. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
